title: A practical guide to using AI well
preview: If you’ve tried ChatGPT or other AI tools and felt underwhelmed, you’re not alone. Most people get generic results and dismiss it as overhyped. But the issue isn’t the tool. It’s how you use it.

title: Instantly improve your prompts with one line
preview: The single greatest tip to improve your AI prompting is: add "Ask me clarifying questions."
keywords: how to write better AI prompts

title: Obvious signs your text was written by AI
preview: A lot of AI generated text still sounds like AI. anyone familiar with these tools can tell. using raw output without edits is a rookie mistake that makes your work feel lazy or off.

title: The 5 biggest prompt mistakes killing your ChatGPT results
preview: ChatGPT can be a superpower but only if you know how to use it. most beginners give up when they don’t get the perfect response immediately and write AI off as hype. here are the most common mistakes people make.
